attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Small clubs are finding it differcult to survive while the greed league (premier league)cream of all the money in football. Its a about time these smalls are given a fair chance please redistribute the money in football because English football will suffer in the long term. Please act now before its to late. I plead to all fans from every small club in every league to sign this petition

rejection.details: This is a matter for the FA.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
